title: I got hacked, hacker got my account banned and riot doesnt want to help me
body: in the last days someone used my account to change my name and he bougth 2 skins with my account i send a ticket asking for help because no one has my password but they didn't help me , today i wanted to play and i saw that my account was banned, and i dont have a email from riot telling me why im banned and they still doestn want to help and i dont know what to do.

replies.body: I don't have context to your case, but I know that the account recovery team won't restore an account or make changes unless they are absolutely sure it's being restored to the owner.  Even if you don't make it the first time, it's okay to try again.  Just fill out an [account recovery form](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new?ticket_form_id=72416) and they can help or offer context.  We'll get back to you!
ok im going to try it again, thank you so much.
